intro: Simple and secure password manager. Works client-side only (offline too) with no backend. Uses encrypted file import/export. Helps to keep your passwords to yourself.
storePasswordInfo: This password is used to decrypt your store. It can be changed in settings, but cannot be restored, so be sure to save it in safe place.
title: Title or URL
label: Label
pressAndHoldToRemoveFromStore: Press and hold to remove from store

forbiddenService: Since Russia commits genocide, terror and countless war crimes against the Ukrainian people, the application is not available for its regions.
newContentAvailable: New content available, click on reload button to update
bubbleWrap: Bubble Wrap - Pops under the slightest pressure
gardenFence: Garden Fence - A bit of a barrier, but mostly just for show
bankVault: Bank Vault - Solid, reliable, but not impenetrable
